name: Transitly: AI-Powered Moving Assistant
description: Built an intelligent moving assistant that automates address change workflows across 10+ services (USPS, utilities, insurance, DMV, banks).
Integrated AWS Nova Act SDK for autonomous browser automation to autofill forms up to final review, reducing 6+ hours of manual work to 20 minutes.
Implemented real-time checklist tracking with OAuth authentication, saving user preferences in DynamoDB for seamless multi-step task management.
Features conversational AI chatbot for guidance and automated confirmation logging with calendar reminders.

name: CollabWatch
description: Developed a real-time video collaboration platform for students using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Docker, and Amazon EC2.
Implemented WebSockets for live interaction, improving real-time communication.

name: Reforestation Cost Analysis Project
description: Preprocessed and cleaned U.S. forest reforestation datasets (handled missing values, normalized features, and engineered cost-related variables) to ensure model reliability.
Developed and compared predictive models (Linear Regression, Ridge/Lasso) to identify the most effective method for quantifying relationships between project costs and reforestation outcomes.
Conducted residual analysis and visualized key patterns using scatter plots and regression lines, uncovering cost thresholds that maximize reforestation efficiency.
Generated data-driven insights that could inform sustainable resource allocation strategies in U.S. reforestation initiatives.

name: Heap Allocator
description: Designed a custom heap allocator with next-fit placement, splitting, and coalescing.
Optimized memory management using C, improving allocation efficiency.
